content.question: A sociologist recorded the number of contacts entered in a cell phone and the number of texts sent in a week for 20 cell phone users. The resulting data were used to conduct a hypothesis test to investigate whether there is a linear relationship between the number of contacts and the number of texts sent. What are the correct hypotheses for the test?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 is not equal to 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: b sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: b sub 1 is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 9.4: Setting Up a Test for the Slope of a Regression Model

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
